name: Jumpy Panda - Earth Day Special
description:
Absolutely FREE and super fun adventure!

Easy to play! Touch and hold to raise a pole - release finger to jump!

Compete with your FRIENDS and beat the world record!

Pole vault from land to land

Avoid the patrol birds

Do not jump on the bombs

Catch the parrot and get an extra life!

Maybe you will be on the top of the leaderboard! Become the panda master - big clumsy panda wants your help!

Jumpy Panda - Earth Day Special is waiting for you!
